messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: What is easy to do but no one does? YOUR SUIT SENSORS! So put it on.

messages.author: Chief Medical Officer's Desk
messages.body: Yeah do what the captain said set these suit sensors up mongoloids

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Escape Shuttle Hallway.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to [REDACTED], a number of energy draining parasites have swarmed into the place with all those juicy wires.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

High levels of radiation detected near the station. Maintenance is best shielded from radiation.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Research Division Server Room.
